package.name: marble_qav500_sensor_config_1
package.description: The marble_qav500_sensor_config_1 package is derived from marble's air vehicle system's submission. This sensor configuration has: - a Lidar ouster OS1-64 - an Intel realsense D435 - air pressure, magnetometer, IMU, and - 2 Pico flexx cameras.
package.author: Derek Vasquez
Hector Escobar
